metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10914 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that an attacker could issue a xattr request via glusterfs FUSE to cause gluster brick process to crash which will result in a remote denial of service. If gluster multiplexing is enabled this will result in a crash of multiple bricks and gluster volumes. It was discovered that GlusterFS incorrectly handled FUSE requests. An attacker could use this issue to obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
